ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: Agnieszka Synowiec would like to thank E. Lainé, Director of the Research Unit at the Pôle Universataire in Chartres, France, for providing her with space and equipment to perform the greenhouse experiments and biochemical analyses of plants. She also would like to acknowledge Jean Philippe Blondeau, from Institut PRISME, Orléans University at Chartres branch, for taking the SEM photos of MPEO.
